samastha lanka surathawa rathnapura adhyapana kalapaya himi kara ganimin sabaragamuwa palath pasal krida ulela kagalla nagarika kridanganayedi awasan wiya.pasugiya 8da patan pura dina hatharak pawathi sabaragamuwa palath krida ulelata kagalla, mawanalla, dehioowita, rathnapura, ambailipitiya, niwithagala saha balangoda yana sabaragamuwa palathe adhyapana kalapa hathakata ayath pasal 1157k niyojanaya karamin kridaka kridikawo thundahasak pamana me tharagawaliyata idiripath wuha.kandayam tharaga 16k saha tharaga isaw 125k eeta athulath wiya.jyeshta anshaye samastha krida surathawa lakunu 687.5k himi karagath rathnapura adhyapana kalapayata himi wu athara lakunu 607.5k himikaragath kagalla adhyapana kalapaya anusurathawa dina ganna ladi.lakunu 255k himikaragath mawanalla adhyapana kalapaya thewana sthanayata pathwiya.
